texto: 5.4.4 Disposition o f change A process should be established, implemented and maintained for the disposition of change that identifies the dispositioning authority (see 4.2) for each proposed change. This should take into account the category o f the proposed change. A fter a proposed change has been evaluated, the dispositioning authority should review the evaluation and should decide upon the disposition of the change. The disposition should be retained as documented information. Notice of the disposition should be distributed to relevant internal and external interested parties.
